tweet: Just a reminder that if you're a cardano stakepool operator, then make a video about yourself and share it on our reddit. I'll retweet it here on my Twitter feed so our community can get to know you

New people are entering crypto and they can be a bit lost since there are so many projects. However, only a few of them will be relevant in a few years. #Cardano will be part of the decentralized future.  Read a few facts about Cardano:  https://t.co/Yq2cwWHl2b  $ADA #Bitcoin $BTC

I am reading about #Hydra - the second layer solution for payment and smart contracts. It is just amazing that the same E-UTxO that is used on-chain can be used off-chain. E-UTxO can be added/removed to/from Hydra-head without close/open. I like it!  #Cardano #blockchain #crypto  https://t.co/Yjj7PeABvu

A lot of questions about my current thoughts on Cardano, especially after the virus spreading and crypto crash. To my knowledge the outlook hasn't changed. They're still going to be releasing the Byron reboot soon followed by the Haskell Shelley testnet update.
